questions.question: The existence of electromagnetic waves was first experimentally demonstrated by

explanations.a: Incorrect: Maxwell predicted electromagnetic waves theoretically.
explanations.b: Incorrect: Faraday contributed to the theory but did not demonstrate EM waves.
explanations.c: Correct: Heinrich Hertz experimentally demonstrated EM waves in 1887.
explanations.d: Incorrect: Tesla worked on electromagnetism but not EM wave demonstration.

questions.question: The electromagnetic waves travel with velocity

answers.c: Less than the velocity of light
answers.d: Greater than the velocity of light

explanations.a: Correct: EM waves travel at the speed of light in a vacuum (â‰ˆ 3 x 10^8 m/s).
explanations.b: Incorrect: Speed of sound is much slower than EM waves.
explanations.c: Incorrect: In vacuum, EM wave speed equals light speed.
explanations.d: Incorrect: Nothing travels faster than the speed of light in vacuum.
